name: Rapid Shot
text: You can make an additional ranged attack.
benefit: When making a full-attack action with a ranged weapon, you can fire one additional time this round at your highest bonus. All of your attack rolls take a –2 penalty when using Rapid Shot.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend a number of stamina points up to the number of shots taken using this feat. If you do, you decrease the penalty of a single Rapid Shot ranged attack by 2 for each stamina point you spent.
mythicText: You can fire many times each round with amazing precision.
mythicBenefit: When using Rapid Shot, you can either ignore the feat’s –2 penalty on attack rolls or make two additional attacks instead of one.
text_zh: 你能够进行一次额外的远程攻击。
benefit_zh: 使用远程武器进行全力攻击时，你在该轮能够以你最高的加值多射击一次。使用速射时，你的所有攻击检定承受-2减值。
mythicText_zh: 你能够以惊人的准度连续进行数次射击。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用快速射击专长时，你能够选择忽略该专长对攻击检定带来的-2减值，或者选择进行2次额外攻击以取代原本的1次。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗至多等同于你在使用这个专长时打出的远端攻击次数的耐力。如果你这样做了，你可以降低单次快速射击远端攻击的减值，每消耗1点耐力就能降低2点。
